src_original: na sa kaścid bhagavaṃ dharmo yaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /  Vaj 13c; folio 39rl-6 (Cz 38.7-15; G 5al-2; P182.10-15)
yāvataḥ subhūte tṛsāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau pṛthivīrajaḥ kaccit tad bahu bhavet /  subhūtir āha /
bahu bhagavans tat pṛthivīrajo bhavet /  yat tad bhagavan /  pṛthivīrajaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ arajaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
yā sā lokadhātur adhātuḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
